definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: So I'm going to stay away from you for a few days."
sentences.chinese: 因此我要和你分開一段時間。”

sentences.english: Young scene seize turned separate yeongjo, want to notice him about plucking exceedingly senti-mental secrets.
sentences.chinese: 幼景抓住轉身分開的英祖，要通知他關於寒星的機密。

sentences.english: I knew that. The pointees are separate.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，指針數據是分開的。

sentences.english: Well, how can you tell the one from the other?
sentences.chinese: 那麼你怎麼把它們分開呢？

sentences.english: Spare parts shall be packed separately from the vessels.
sentences.chinese: 備件應同容器分開包裝。

sentences.english: And now you get separation on the order of centimeters.
sentences.chinese: 現在可能分開到釐米的程度。

sentences.english: She left the office with tears in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 她眼裏含着淚，分開了辦公室。

sentences.english: They're kept away from other chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 它們與其它化學藥品分開貯藏。

sentences.english: They look too contrived--and buying separates is much more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲套裝看上去太做作，分開買更實惠些。

sentences.english: Some of these atoms combine with separate oxygen molecules to form ozone.
sentences.chinese: 一些原子由於分開的氧分子聯合形成新鮮的空氣。

sentences.english: Templates and foundation bolting shall be shipped separately from the vessels according to Purchaser's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 樣板及地腳螺栓應根據買方指導同容器分開運輸。

sentences.english: Squat with your feet a little less than shoulder distance apart.
I have no feelings whatsoever when were apart.
sentences.chinese: 當我們分開的時候，我心如止水。

sentences.english: The cell at the top is at prophase, showing the condensing chromosomes prior to their separation.
sentences.chinese: 上面的細胞處於分裂前期，凝集的染色體將要分開。

sentences.english: Left arms abducts even more and is now in full shoulder and elbow extension.
sentences.chinese: 左臂分開更多並且保持直臂肘部拉伸。

sentences.english: They were devoted to each other all those years, only ever separated by war or sickness over that time.
sentences.chinese: 他們一直相儒以末，除了戰爭和疾病曾把他們分開。
